oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sobolev spaces with respect to weighted Gaussian measures in infinite dimensions
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ferrari, Simone
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Analysis of PDEs
Mathematics - Probability
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Let $X$ be a separable Banach space endowed with a non degenerate Gaussian measure $\mu$ and let $w$ be a positive function on $X$ such that $w\in W^{1,s}(X,\mu)$ and $\log w\in W^{1,t}(X,\mu)$ for some $s>1$ and $t>s'$. We introduce and study weighted Sobolev functions and their traces on hypersurfaces of the form $\{x\in X\,|\, G(x) = 0\}$, where $w$ is the chosen weight and $G$ is a suitable version of Gaussian Sobolev function.
